text: Boris Zaborov (; 16 October 1935 – 20 January 2021) was a Soviet Belarusian artist. He moved to Paris, France in 1980 to begin a career in painting. He was born in Minsk. Zaborov died on 20 January 2021 in Paris at the age of 85.Памёр мастак Барыс Забораў ==References== ==Other websites== * Boris Zaborov on Artnet Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:People from Minsk Category:French painters
title: Boris Zaborov
